name: Keep Yourself Alive (Binus Game Development Club)
name_original: Keep Yourself Alive (Binus Game Development Club)
description:
No one can escape death.
Delaying it? Maybe. . .?

Before you completely die, you're sent to The Limbo Plane.
You won't survive long in here, as your life decaying each seconds.
Although, you can take some medicines to prolong your life!

Try to survive as long as you can through hordes of Reapers trying to collect your soul.
Even near death, you will try to come through!

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Left Mouse - Shoot

Right Mouse  - Throw Grenade

Esc - Pause


CREDITS

Derian Ardenichson - Game Designer and Programmer

Ferry - Game 2D Artist

Lauretta Gail Rosalind Wijaya - Game Sound Artist

Arkannabil Pratama - Game Sound Artist and Game Designer
